title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.2 - General statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.2 - General statement

State Regulations

Lender of Last Resort loans are Federal Stafford Loans
(both subsidized and unsubsidized) and, as such, are subject to the normal
rules and procedures relating to such loans, except as modified or
distinguished in the following sections of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2103.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
